rukus.text: Inna Allaha Ya'muru Bil-`Adli Wa Al-'Ihsani Wa 'Ita'i Dhi Al-Qurba Wa Yanha `Ani Al-Fahsha'i Wa Al-Munkari Wa Al-Baghyi Ya`izukum La`allakum Tadhakkaruna
Wa 'Awfu Bi`ahdi Allahi 'Idha `Ahadtum Wa La Tanquđu Al-'Aymana Ba`da Tawkidiha Wa Qad Ja`altumu Allaha `Alaykum Kafilaan 'Inna Allaha Ya`lamu Ma Taf`aluna

Wa La Takunu Kallati Naqađat Ghazlaha Min Ba`di Quwatin 'Ankathaan Tattakhidhuna 'Aymanakum Dakhalaan Baynakum 'An Takuna 'Ummatun Hiya 'Arba Min 'Ummatin 'Innama Yablukumu Allahu Bihi Wa Layubayyinanna Lakum Yawma Al-Qiyamati Ma Kuntum Fihi Takhtalifuna
Wa Law Sha'a Allahu Laja`alakum 'Ummatan Wahidatan Wa Lakin Yuđillu Man Yasha'u Wa Yahdi Man Yasha'u Wa Latus'alunna `Amma Kuntum Ta`maluna
Wa La Tattakhidhu 'Aymanakum Dakhalaan Baynakum Fatazilla Qadamun Ba`da Thubutiha Wa Tadhuqu As-Su'a Bima Sadadtum `An Sabili Allahi Wa Lakum `Adhabun `Azimun
Wa La Tashtaru Bi`ahdi Allahi Thamanaan Qalilaan 'Innama `Inda Allahi Huwa Khayrun Lakum 'In Kuntum Ta`lamuna
Ma `Indakum Yanfadu Wa Ma `Inda Allahi Baqin Wa Lanajziyanna Al-Ladhina Sabaru 'Ajrahum Bi'ahsani Ma Kanu Ya`maluna
Man `Amila Salihaan Min Dhakarin 'Aw 'Untha Wa Huwa Mu'uminun Falanuhyiyannahu Hayaatan Tayyibatan Wa Lanajziyannahum 'Ajrahum Bi'ahsani Ma Kanu Ya`maluna
Fa'idha Qara'ta Al-Qur'ana Fasta`idh Billahi Mina Ash-Shaytani Ar-Rajimi
Innahu Laysa Lahu Sultanun `Ala Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Wa `Ala Rabbihim Yatawakkaluna
Innama Sultanuhu `Ala Al-Ladhina Yatawallawnahu Wa Al-Ladhina Hum Bihi Mushrikuna
